snippet.title: Turret Denfese King
snippet.description:
[Google Play Store]
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mobirix.tdwt

[Game Introduction]
- Easy controls! Precise strategy! Various towers and maps are available.

[Game Features]
- Enjoy strategic defense with high-quality graphics, and experience unique battles using various boost items and defense towers.
Destroy objects to acquire resources, and as you progress through the stages, the rewards will upgrade!

The key is to use the right tower for each stage!
Strategically place towers with different abilities to achieve victory!

Homepage : https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=4864673505117639552

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/mobirixplayen

YouTube : https://www.youtube.com/user/mobirix1

Help : cs@mobirix.com
